metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8878 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
KDE KMail does not encrypt attachments in emails when "automatic encryption" is enabled, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by sniffing the network.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8878` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

accountwizard - 4:4.14.6-0ubuntu1
